periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 33, with temperatures rising to around 42 overnight. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 9am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 9am and noon, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between noon and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 48 in the afternoon. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Slight Chance Sleet
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then a slight chance of sleet and rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 30 overnight. North northwest wind 5 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 32. Northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 15. Northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Washington's Birthday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 28. North wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. Northeast wind 5 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy, with a high near 25. North northeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a low around 9. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 19. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 3. North northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 18. North northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 2. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Friday
